actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5(a) of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Loxahatchee River in Florida as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates the Loxahatchee River in Florida as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5(a) of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the Loxahatchee River in Florida as a potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
